forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 22F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow later at night. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow later at night. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
